name: Chess25
description:
Chess25 how to play?

The rules are the same as regular chess except for these changes:

Layout a 5x5 board. On the first row set up blue pieces: rook, knight, king, pawn, bishop. Mirror this setup for yellow. 

Pawns moves like a king therefore on poisson is not allowed. Pawns may only promote to a queen.

You are not allowed to castle.

The rook, bishop and queen move a maximum of 3 squares.

The game randomly determine who is the first player. You are playing against the AI.

Files prefixed with "gj" are the game jam release (submitted on time).
